data.title: WEST HAM CHURCH
data.meta_description: Hope for the people of East London - St John at Hackney; St Luke's, Homerton; St Mary's, Leyton; St Leonard's, Shoreditch; All Saints, West Ham. Church services, Events, Alpha, Venue Hire.
data.text:
ABOUT WEST HAM CHURCH

All Saints, West Ham is in the heart of Newham, and Christian worship has thrived here since 1130. West Ham Church has been part of SAINT since September 2020.

We have a vision to bring hope to the people of East London; to see lives restored, churches revitalised and culture renewed. We will love and serve our local community, create spaces for people to belong, and share the good news of Jesus Christ at every opportunity.

PLAN YOUR VISIT

Parking

There is limited parking in the streets around the church, particularly on event days when

the local street are permit-holders only.

You can go to Newham Council’s website for more information about parking locally.

Public Transport

West Ham Church is close to Abbey Road train station, which on the DLR. It is also not far from West Ham station. West Ham station is serviced by the District, Hammersmith & City, Jubilee and DLR lines.

West Ham Church has a bus stop just a 2 minute walk away – at the junction of New Plaistow Road/Church Street. You can find more information about buses at TfL’s website.

Access

We welcome anyone with accessibility requirements and will endeavour to accommodate any needs you may have. Please get in touch prior to your visit so we can make sure the necessary arrangements are made, by emailing hello@saint.church.
